attributes.action: Petition for the PM to NOT get involved with the Rangers vs HMRC tax issue
attributes.additional_details:
There is a petition floating to get the PM involved with thsi issue. However, it is not in the public interest to do this at present, especially in times of austerity when his attention could be paid to issues affecting the whole country, not just a small percentage of the people of Glasgow. If we, as normal citizens owed tax we would be forced to pay it on our businesses, football clubs shoudl not be immune from this.

Please sign this if you agree.
